description: Check for users with DEVELOPMENT priveldges in Production environment

queries.name: q_development_users
queries.sql: SELECT GRANTEE as grantee FROM EFFECTIVE_PRIVILEGE_GRANTEES WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = 'SYSTEMPRIVILEGE' AND PRIVILEGE = 'DEVELOPMENT' AND GRANTEE NOT IN ('SYSTEM','_SYS_REPO')

actions.description: It has been determined that at least one user or role has the DEVELOPMENT privilege. It is imperative that no user or role in a production database has this privilege.
